(2023) Prospective implementation of AI-assisted screen reading to improve early detection of breast cancer Imperial Profile | dblp | Google Scholar | PubMed | arXiv | CV | YouTube I am Professor in Machine Learning for Imaging and Kheiron Medical / RAEng Research Chair in Safe Deployment of Medical Imaging AI. I am co-leading the Biomedical Image Analysis Group, lead the Heartflow-Imperial Research Team and I am the Knowledge Transfer Lead of CHAI – The EPSRC Causality in Healthcare AI Hub. My research is at the intersection of medical imaging and artificial intelligence aiming to build safe and ethical computational tools for improving image-based detection and diagnosis of disease.
